thread.title: Bridget Moynahan marries New York businessman
thread.title_full: Bridget Moynahan marries New York businessman - CNN.com

author: Lisa Respers France
title: Bridget Moynahan marries New York businessman
text:
Story highlights The actress shared the news via her Instagram account She has a son with football star Tom Brady (CNN) Actress Bridget Moynahan surprised fans recently with the news that she is now a married woman.
The "Blue Bloods" star, who has a son with football player Tom Brady, married New York businessman Andrew Frankel at a ceremony on Saturday in the Hamptons on Long Island, New York. Moynahan posted a wedding picture on her Instagram account with the caption "Oh, by the way, guess what I just did."
Oh, by the way, guess what I just did @johndolanphotog #sohappy #perfection #friends #family #forever
A photo posted by Bridget Moynahan (@bridgetmoynahan) on Oct 17, 2015 at 5:36pm PDT
People reports that Frankel is co-president of Stuart Frankel and Co., a Wall Street institutional brokerage firm, and that the pair met through friends. Moynahan has an 8-year-old son, Jack, with New England Patriots quarterback Brady.
